OrgName.entry: ST JAMES AND ST CHRISTOPHER, SHIREGREEN

Desc.entry: Anglican church. Annual events include a summer fair in July and Christmas fair in November.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Sunday Service at 10am (Holy Communion & junior church), 8.45am (Said Communion), 12.30-3pm (International Christian Church group), 1st Sun in the month at 9.45am (Communion servcie), at 10am (family service), Wed at 10am (Holy Communion), Fri 7-9.30pm (Boys Brigade aged 7-18 years)
